programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: We hear from two lives shaped by unanswered letters. Wendy has never met her father and Helen is searching for her son who she was forced to give up for adoption more than thirty years ago.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia
programme.sub-title: 1980: George Negus, Chantal Contouri, Enid Lorimer
programme.desc: Take a trip back to 1980 where Michael Parkinson spoke with interview guests George Negus, Chantal Contouri and Enid Lorimer.
What impact will changes to the first home buyer scheme have on the property market? Sarah Ferguson interviews film director James Cameron. Plus Jane Goodall has died at the age of 91.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: This week we set sail to investigate illegal fishing, find out how communities feel about the COP UN Climate Conference possibly coming to our region for the first time, plus an archive of more than 1300 Pacific languages.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Restoration Australia
programme.desc: Built in 1843 of convict bricks, Keera Vale has suffered severe damage and needs love and care. Jen and Harold have fallen for the house on the hill, but is love enough to save this grand old dame?

programme.title: Spicks And Specks
programme.sub-title: Emily Wurramara, Claire Hooper, Ella Hooper and Brett Blake
programme.desc: Emily Wurramara, Claire Hooper, Ella Hooper and Brett Blake join Alan, Myf and Adam as they hit such musical heights they have to go into falsetto. There will be RandB, Irish music and some unfortunate innuendos.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: A special 35 minute edition of ABC News NSW, with extended Stateline reporting and interviews on the issues affecting NSW. Plus the days top stories and latest news presented by Amy Greenbank, plus sport with Chloe Hart.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: When a prominent barrister and his second wife are found shot dead in their home the crime scene has uncanny parallels to another double murder 15 years ago - is it a copycat killing or was the wrong man prosecuted?

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the days events, explaining whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Events lead Nikki to conclude that getting the truth will put the Lyell team and everything they love in danger. (Final)

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: When a prominent barrister and his second wife are found shot dead in their home the crime scene has uncanny parallels to another double murder 15 years ago - is it a copycat killing or was the wrong man prosecuted?

programme.title: Take 5 With Zan Rowe
programme.desc: One of the most talked about pop artists today; Lorde shares her story of rebirth in a deep and candid conversation with Zan.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Kristy OBrien ventures to the tiny South Australian town of Lucindale, discovering a small community playing a big role in keeping the most colourful bush traditions alive.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: The Shipton Abbott Players rope in Humphrey to play a detective, but the fictional crime becomes real when the amateur murder victim gets a real knife in his back.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: The Origin Story Of Pauline and Lost Words: Beyond The Page
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: We crack open the great book of gamings past to learn the origin story of Pauline, plus we journey through a literary adventure that literally leaps off the page in Lost Words: Beyond The Page!

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: This episode tells the tale of where the baby Bears once lived. After a run-in with a video crew shooting a Sarah McLachlan-type animal adoption video, they almost seized an opportunity to find homes apart.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Mr Ramier gets akumatized into M. Pigeon for the 72nd time, and now, he can turn people into evil pigeons! To stop him, Ladybug will have to ruffle his feathers once more.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Lets Get Cosy in Animal Crossing!
programme.desc: Gems joined by special guest Remy Hii for an Animal Crossing extravaganza! Plus, Tom Nook infiltrates soccer practice, alternative games to play if you like decorating sims and SG helps you build a bigger AC house in Ask SG!

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak
programme.desc: Find out whats going on in the world with a news bulletin designed for children, featuring stories that are relevant and easy to understand.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The huge axe of Robot Thor driven by Jason, a builder from Northampton, clashes with Will and Ian from Team Shockwave. Judge Sethu Vijayakumar discusses his work with NASA in creating androids for the Mission to Mars.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: Lets Keep Going Lord Beerus! The Battle Of Gods!
programme.desc: With his powers mostly under control, Goku ramps up the battle. But Beerus is still filled with unbelievable power and Goku takes hit after hit. Even though his injuries heal, can he handle the true strength of Beerus power?

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Balan Wonderworld and Crash Bandicoot: On The Run!
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: We dive into the colourful platforming wonderland of Balan Wonderworld, and take the new mobile Crash Bandicoot game for a spin!

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: On a day out with Ice Bear, Chloe realises Ice Bear only runs errands for his brothers. Determined to show him a fun day in the city, Chloe promises to help Ice Bear have a good time.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: A famous comedian gets akumatised into Psycomedian. Able to impose any emotions on anyone, he wants to wipe the smiles off everyones faces...starting with Ladybug and Cat Noir!

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Hard Quiz Kids
programme.sub-title: Roblox, Bluey, Godzilla and the Monsterverse and the Solar System
programme.desc: Who will win Tom Gleesons Big Brass Mug? Carlos with Roblox, Mila and her love of Bluey, Gus with Godzilla and the Monsterverse, or Inaya with the Solar System?

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: Janine is thrilled when her best friend from college is hired as the art teacher.

programme.title: Pokemon: Diamond And Pearl
programme.desc: In the Floaroma Pokemon Contest, Dawn finds herself facing off against not only "Jessilina" but also her old friend Kenny!

programme.title: Officially Amazing
programme.desc: There are some incredible attempts today with ice hockey legends, a bendy woman and a man up in the sky walking between two hot air balloons.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Some of the best loved stand-ups and a raft of the next generation of comedians, featuring Glenn Moore, Dan Tiernan, Toussaint Douglass, Laura Smyth, Travis Jay, Ivo Graham, Sharon Wanjohi and Rhys James.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Things get explosive in the lab when Dr Chris and Dr Xand look at how spots are made. The Doctors get snotted in Ouchology, we meet new Oucher Isaac, and join an incredible Flying Doctors! in Australia!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: A pterodactyl attacks a town on Christmas Eve

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: When Alpheus Benthos announces he has found the gates to Lemuria, the Nektons fear hes beaten them to their greatest prize! But Alpheus soon unleashes forces he cannot control!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Disoriented Drone
programme.desc: After a little girls drone is blown away, the Inbestigators must prove that a boy in a neighbouring house has claimed it as his own.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: When Bubbles video goes viral, she goes to great lengths to maintain her status as a big-time director.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Female heroes and villains unite to save Robin, Cyborg and Beast Boy.

programme.title: George Clarkes Old House New Home
programme.desc: George tacklesÂ a tricky cottage conundrum in which a previous owner has removed all the upstairs walls. Plus, he meets a couple who have ambitious plans to turn their loft into a luxurious cinema room.

programme.title: Murder By Numbers
programme.desc: A young womans body is found in woods near a small California coastal town. Making her way through microscopic hints of evidence, Det. Cassie Mayweather has a gut feeling that there is more to this murder than meets the eye.

programme.title: Rage
programme.sub-title: rage Vault Guest Programmer: Sugar Ray (2000)
programme.desc: Join sun-soaked California rockers Sugar Ray as they guest program rage, filmed in 2000 as the band toured Australia for the first time.

programme.title: Traces
programme.desc: Lab assistant Emma Hedges is now training to be a forensic chemist, and on the cusp of seeing her mothers murder case finally resolved. Daniel is to give evidence against his father in the High Court. Will justice be served?

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Find out how fast your nerves work when Dr Xand blows a fuse in the lab with a new underpants experiment, and Dr Chris accidentally sticks his hand in a slimy snot sample!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: If You Cant Scooby-doo The Time, Dont Scooby Doo The Crime
programme.desc: A ghostly inmate haunts an inescapable prison.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The Dark Orca pirates unwittingly steal a treasure that can awaken a Monumential and possibly destroy them and the Nektons.

programme.title: Guy Montgomerys Guy Mont Spelling Bee (NZ)
programme.sub-title: Its Not Your Fault, its the Time Machine
programme.desc: Joe Daymond, Janaye Henry, Paul Ego and our winning player from episode seven fight to the very spelling death to be named winner of Guy Monts Spelling Bee! Games include The Time Machine and Letters. (Final)

programme.title: Moon And Me
programme.desc: Mr Onion discovers a picnic basket in the curiosity box, it is already packed with food and a tablecloth. In Storyland, everybody climbs to the top of the hill to share a picnic.

programme.title: Beep And Mort
programme.desc: Beep and Mort want to go camping so they can experience the beauty of nature. But as a storm rolls in, the pair are forced inside, disrupting their plans.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Detective Ziggy investigates who is eating the cafe food in the middle of the night. He is determined to solve the case of the Midnight Muncher.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: Mole has a great time snowboarding in the sand dunes while she waits for the real thing.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are having so much fun playing together they dont want to say goodbye when Amma arrives to pick Sula up. To delay her departure Bing hides Sulas sparkly shoe in the toilet and it gets soaking wet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a traffic jam on the way to Granny and Grandpa Pigs. They still havent arrived when lunch is ready, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring it to them - in his wheelbarrow.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzer discovers Shaun watching old home movies in the barn. However, they dont like everything they see! Things get heated as the pair try to outdo each other by showing embarrassing clips from each others past.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Moose teaches the kids how to slowly cook potatoes outdoors, but their hunger makes them impatient and soon lunch is the least of their worries...

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isnt as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and some of her friends visit Mrs Badgers Farm. Today Mrs Badger shows them how the farm tractor works.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: The cadets hit the river with their canoes for a picnic day. But while Frizzy and Gemma cannot paddle in sync, Neville and Pounce find themselves in hot water.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: The Super Monsters car wash becomes a magical mishap, teaching teamwork and responsibility.

programme.title: Nikhil and Jay
programme.sub-title: Nikhil and Jay and the Turmeric Superpower
programme.desc: Jay gets turmeric on his hands and turns everything yellow! What if the whole world turns yellow with his turmeric superpower?

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie is excited for his first sleepover at Ninas house! He learns how to prepare, what to pack, and how to deal with the difficulties of sleeping away from home.

programme.title: Play School Science Time
programme.desc: What else can cause ice to melt? Luke is fishing for answers in the Science Time Lab. Join him to discover the effect that salt can have on ice and catch an icy swishy fish or two along the way!

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Tsehay has made some lemonade to share with her friends! There is some for Simon, but then there is no lemonade left for Anthony. What to do? Dorothy flies off in the Big Red Plane for help.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: I holds hands with N and they find themselves stuck inside a floating balloon. This episode introduces the letters I and N - and the words tin, tip and pin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her Rescue Helicopter!

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Tish stuggles with maths homework and wants to give up. Rosa encourages her and tempts her with a pie after her homework is complete.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Vida helps a baby bird who feels too shy to talk.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: The cadets hit the river with their canoes for a picnic day. But while Frizzy and Gemma cannot paddle in sync, Neville and Pounce find themselves in hot water.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When a Railway Show for little engines comes to Sodor, an overly excited Percy finally sees his chance to shine.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Hannah and Zsofi plant a colourful edible flower garden, perfect for a yummy garden tea party.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Count along to One, Two, Three, Four, Five, and join the fun! Paloma the Mermaid is visiting today but Lucia, Simon, and Lachy have lost their Wiggle. Can Tsehay help them find it before she arrives?

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Ariel has a houseguest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbits lighthouse.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: When rising water levels threaten to wipe out albatross nests, the Octonauts build a break-wall and look for a new place to relocate the albatrosses.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee gets a delivery, which arrives in a big cardboard box. The squirrels discover that cardboard boxes can be great fun. Roly makes a car out of one, Tag makes a tunnel then all the squirrels make a big cardboard castle!

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato is delighted when Evil Pea becomes his sidekick, but its all a trick and Evil Pea captures him! Evil Pea is forced to do a good deed because one of the cobs needs help.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad and his mates hit the backyard, ready to rip up some tree stumps! But when BlueyÂ and Bingo take overÂ a stump asÂ aÂ nail salon, Dad finds hes got some negotiating to do.

programme.title: Moon And Me
programme.desc: When Pepi Nana loses her pencil, Little Nana finds it under the wardrobe. Because she is small, Little Nana sees things that Pepi Nana might not see. On a walk Little Nana shows Pepi Nana new things along the way.

programme.title: Beep And Mort
programme.desc: On a steamy hot day in Mollyvale, Pop enlists Beep and Mort to set up a mollymelonade stand to help everyone cool off. But Pops plan comes unstuck and Beep and Mort step in to make sure no one in Mollyvale goes thirsty.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Ziggy loves music and is sure that if he had the right instrument he would be a fantastic player. He orders several musical instrument in the mail, but all of his friends seem to be able to play them better than he can.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector is encouraged by the Seed Collector to listen to things he cant see.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing takes his Hoppity Voosh toy to the park to see the ducks and play on the slide. But when he steps in dog poo and heads to Ammas house to get cleaned up he leaves Hoppity behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its time for bed. Peppa and George have a bath and brush their teeth so Daddy Pig can read them a story. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig finally sit down but they are sleepy too.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzer has a map and a nose for hidden treasure - especially when its a bone! This time he has unearthed more than he can chew. Shaun and The Flock get stuck in to help discover what he has found.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bingo loves horsing around with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep their fun within her limits.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo run a crazy "Hotel" with Dad as their put upon guest. But when Bingo quits over Bluey being too controlling, Dad needs to teach them the importance of compromise.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone (that has the power to freeze Dad in space and time) Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its bedtime and Bingo cant remember where she left her beloved Floppy! Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead Mum through their bizzare day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey cant wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey is running a taxi service. Her first passenger is Businessman Dad, who is in a rush to get to the airport. But with unexpected delays, Dads in danger of missing his flight!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo dont want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it for them. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions with disastrous results.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: On a picnic in the park, Bluey and her friends play Shadowlands. But when Coco keeps taking shortcuts, Bluey has to show her that following the rules can make the game more fun.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house with their last balloon, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Honey is stuck waiting for Dr Bingo as the other, more exciting injuries get seen before her. Receptionist Bluey tells her to be patient, some of these cases are a real pickle!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its lunchtime on Blueys back deck! But every BBQ needs a side salad, so Bingos relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Playing Shops is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing whos who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At school, Bluey and her friends throw themselves into various games. Teacher Calypso keeps her charges on track with a wise word and a song... all except the mysterious Pretzel.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy, leaving Bluey no choice but to operate immediately!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Dad has to stop having fun with the girls and go to work, Bluey and Bingo scramble to keep him playing games with them on the trampoline!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey needs Mums advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingos growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Blueys playgroup is at odds when Indys baby hospital collides with Rustys knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they find their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: In a game of Work, Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its time for a family game of hide and seek! Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys?

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Blueys backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy Gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Blueys house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mums got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its an adventure on the high seas as Bluey, Bingo and Missy play Pirates on the hammock swing, but theyll need to find their courage to withstand storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: During a game of hairdressers, Bluey discovers that big-headed customer Dad has nits! To help treat them Bingo has to find her voice, while Bluey has to find her ears.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Bluey accidentally makes Bingo upset playing a game at dinner, she will do anything to make her happy again - even changing the rules of the game. But nothing seems to work.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings dont always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: On Bingo and Blueys Rug Island, a pack of felt pens can be anything - bananas, campfires, even a snake! But Dad will need to embrace his inner kid if he wants to make it his home.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: All aboard the Dad Train! Bingo goes from home to daycare to her job at the Vet every morning, but theres trouble on the lineÂ as a mischievous Bluey throws everyone off schedule.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Dad brings a pair of tenacious tickle crabs home from the beach, no where in the house is safe! His only hope of escaping their tickles is with help from his true love.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Bingo drops Mums breakfast-in-bed on the floor, shes convinced shes ruined her big day. But Bluey helps make amends by putting on a play of how Mum and Dad first met.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad refuses to be late dropping off Bluey and Bingo at kindy and school, but the girls make Dad play so many games, they quickly derail his plan.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Bluey has a playdate at Chloes, Bingo must learn how to play by herself. But all the games she knows need more than one person! Luckily Dad has a problem that needs solving.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in Dance Mode as payback. But the others cant resist taking Bingos turns for her.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the Queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too scared to tell Bus Driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Inside Bingos dream, Bingo and Floppy have an intergalactic adventure, while the rest of her sleep-deprived family try to navigate Bingos non-stop night-time bedhopping.

programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: When a prominent barrister and his second wife are found shot dead in their home the crime scene has uncanny parallels to another double murder 15 years ago - is it a copycat killing or was the wrong man prosecuted?

programme.title: Take 5 With Zan Rowe
programme.desc: One of the most talked about pop artists today; Lorde shares her story of rebirth in a deep and candid conversation with Zan.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Kristy OBrien ventures to the tiny South Australian town of Lucindale, discovering a small community playing a big role in keeping the most colourful bush traditions alive.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: The Shipton Abbott Players rope in Humphrey to play a detective, but the fictional crime becomes real when the amateur murder victim gets a real knife in his back.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the latest on todays news, covering whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart in Perth.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: This week we set sail to investigate illegal fishing, find out how communities feel about the COP UN Climate Conference possibly coming to our region for the first time, plus an archive of more than 1300 Pacific languages.
